metadata.title: CVE-2019-12446 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 8.3through 11.11. It allows Information Exposure through an Error Message.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
